    • insert

      public abstract GTUIterator<T> insert​(GTUIterator<T> position, T value) throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, javax.naming.SizeLimitExceededException
      Adds the specified component to this container at the given position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position at which to insert the component.
      value - the component to be added.
      Returns:
      iterator of the content which is inserted.
      Throws:
      java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - to indicate that someone trying to access array element with an inappropriate index.
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - to indicate that the method has been passed an illegal or inappropriate argument.
      javax.naming.SizeLimitExceededException - This exception is thrown when a method produces a result that exceeds a size-related limit.

      erases range of element from container.
      Parameters:
      first - first element of the range which will be erased
      last - last element of the range which will be erased

      return iterator of first
